# MTLSamplerMinMagFilter.nearest

**Case**

Select the single pixel nearest to the sample point.

## Declaration

```swift
case nearest
```

## Filter options

- **MTLSamplerMinMagFilter.linear**: Select two pixels in each dimension and interpolate linearly between them.

items.description: Select two pixels in each dimension and interpolate linearly between them.
